body.name: WLIVE Dresser for Bedroom with 8 Drawers, Wide Fabric Dresser for Storage and Organization, Bedroom Dresser, Chest of Drawers for Living Room, Closet, Hallway, Charcoal Black Wood Grain Print
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 21 hrs 6 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Multipurpose Dresser: Match perfectly with other WLIVE storage towers; This fabric dresser is ideal for bedroom, closet,living room, hallway, dorm and office.
Roomy Storage Space: The 8 foldable deep drawers are spacious and provide endless organizational possibilities. Wooden top can place things you want to display or keep in reach, such as lamp, photos…

Sturdy and Durable: The bedroom dresser can also be TV stand for small-size TV; With strong steel frame, water-resistant top and high-grade fabric drawers, the dresser is designed for a long service time.
Exquisite Design: Easy pull handles help open and close the drawers smoothly; 4 adjustable feet can protect your floor from scratches and are designed for uneven ground.
Overall Dimension: The wide chest of drawers measures 39.4" L x 11.8" W x 30.4" H. The dresser for bedroom comes with detailed instructions and all hardware needed, it is easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent, simple dresser
reviews.reviewText: Hubby bought this for his office & it was pretty easy to assemble & has alot of space. Looks great too & is easy to keep clean- nice laminate-like top. We ended up ordering a couple more for other rooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for my kids room. Holds lots of clothes. Smaller than I expected but I still like it. Seems sturdy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: Smaller than it appears in the pictures but it is my fault for not looking at the measurements supplied. Hold a lot of clothes! This is great quality for being fabric bins. Pretty sturdy, but if you have children I'd mount to the wall. It comes with hardware to do that if you're okay with putting large holes in the wall (not good for rentals). I was impressed with the packaging, extra pieces, and instructions. I did not like the little tool it came with to put it together, took longer than expected to put together. Overall great for an inexpensive temporary solution to my storage needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This dresser is perfect for holding a fair amount of clothes, or linens/bedding. Easy to assemble, it’s also stylish and doesn’t look or feel cheap. It’s also very study and comes with adjustable feet to make sure that it remains level. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks okay but flimsy and not that pretty.
reviews.reviewText: It works for what is intended, its lightweight, looks alright but I expected more for the price. Looks a kinda cheap. I would not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Update: Check Under the Flap for Instructions
reviews.reviewText: This furniture had no instructions whatsoever!!!Update: the instructions were hidden under the box flap since the booklet was small. They fell out when I was breaking it down for recycle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great storage and quick set up!
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t sure about this dresser once I figured out it was vinyl but once I received it I had no issues. The storage is amazing and they’re very lightweight so easy to move and organize.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Uh oh stinky but wonderful
reviews.reviewText: PROS:I love this dresser overall. Assembly was easy for the fact that it was a whole dresser; this actually has me preferring fabric drawer dressers now. The wood slab on the top of dresser is good quality and I love the style. I did not use the stabilizing tools that they included to secure it to the wall, but it’s fine as it is against my wall. Looks great :) the instructions were clear, even for me, since I tend to get confused and misunderstand instructions very easily. It also came with an Allen key that had a screwdriver on the end, which was SUPER helpful.CONS:Some of the screws were irritating to screw in, mainly the screws for the handles on the drawers. For this reason I might recommend to some to just use a fitting screwdriver of their own; turning the Allen key to screw them in was not easy. Also, IT DOES STINK??? It’s not like… HORRID, but… it smells like some sort of artificial packaging and made my room smell like it for like 3 days!!!
